api_list.name: Get players by country
api_list.description: Gets all the players from a team
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shescoresapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/country/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shescoresapi.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all players
api_list.description: Gets all the players from all the teams
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://shescoresapi.p.rapidapi.com/api/players"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "shescoresapi.p.rapidapi.com"
